title: La cuisine est un jeu d'enfants
overview: Taken from Michel Oliver's collection of bestsellers, this series brings the world's favorite recipes to everyone's fingertips. Bob and Prune, the apprentice cooks, and Michel, the friendly chef, present a new recipe in each episode, to be made in complete safety. Casserole eggs with ham, apple crumble, flan du soleil... Our friends share their tips and tricks.
